statements: UPDATE bank_accounts SET account_balance = 50000.00 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE bank_accounts SET transaction_history = '{"type": "deposit", "amount": 1000.00}' WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE bank_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 500, transaction_history = transaction_history || '{"type": "deposit", "amount": 500}' WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE bank_accounts SET transaction_history = transaction_history || '{"type": "withdrawal", "amount": 200}', account_balance = account_balance - 200 WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 1500 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_histories SET amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 500.75 WHERE account_id = 12345
UPDATE transaction_histories SET amount = amount + 100.50, transaction_type = 'Credit' WHERE account_id = 54321 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 1500.25 WHERE account_id = 1001;
UPDATE customer_accounts SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 2001;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 123
UPDATE transaction_histories SET transaction_amount = 500, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE transaction_id = 456
UPDATE Account SET account_balance = 1500.00 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = 500.50, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE Account SET account_balance = account_balance - 1000.50 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount + 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE Account SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_number = 12345;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = 1000, transaction_date = '2022-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 67890;
UPDATE Account SET balance = balance - 1000.50 WHERE account_number = 12345;
UPDATE Transaction SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount + 5000.75, transaction_date = '2022-03-15 08:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
